abstract: Well, it seems clear that BP doesn’t stand for “be prepared,” regardless of the signs they hang at their gas stations. Now that the worst has happened, the company could be put in play. But they’re not the only company in trouble: the UBS client data deal just hit a snag, and you have to wonder what Justice thinks.
snippet: Well, it seems clear that BP doesn’t stand for “be prepared,” regardless of the signs they hang at their gas stations. Now that the worst has happened, the company could be put in play. But they’re not the only company in trouble: the UBS client d...
lead_paragraph: Well, it seems clear that BP doesn’t stand for “be prepared,” regardless of the signs they hang at their gas stations. Now that the worst has happened, the company could be put in play. But they’re not the only ones in trouble: the UBS client data deal just hit a snag, and you have to wonder what Justice thinks about it.
